title: [QUESTION] SetScaleTranslate is obsolete

comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body:
Thanks for raising this. It should have been a Create* variant. Just like you see in the docs, people create a new object and then call set. It was to reduce that into a single create.

I think I forgot to add it. 

But for now, if you need it, then it should be fine to use it. I was cleaning up the API surface to make it more consistent, but no loss in functionality or less performance.

If you don't want to use obsolete things, then you can also create a `Translate.Concat(Scale)` matrix. (not sure about the order offhand). It is the same thing.
